      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-paged_list view-dom-id-57fc4c9d86c529283e45f23c9d5c9fb0">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76755">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo" title="Assista ao vivo!" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35275" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/ddnexus2_br_6.jpg?itok=XoYI3Eqm" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/assista-ao-vivo">Assista ao vivo!</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Tixinha recebe Takeshi, Revolta, brTT e YoDa para comentarem os melhores momentos das semifinais da Primeira Etapa 2017!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76755">8 min ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76749">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede" title="Três lados contra a parede" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35827" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/3lados-header-legacy.jpg?itok=b3eRXw8E" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/tres-lados-contra-parede">Três lados contra a parede</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Cada jogador das semifinais tem um propósito e um desafio individual. Uns lutam por reconhecimento, outros pela fama, alguns para se provar para todos, e há quem só queira se sentir parte de algo maior. Esta matéria é o ponto de vista de Takeshi, Ziriguidun e micaO.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76749">1 hour ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-74370">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/rotacao-semanal-gratis-vayne-lulu-braum-e-mais" title="Rotação Semanal Grátis: Vayne, Lulu, Braum e mais!" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-34439" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">
  <img typeof="foaf:Image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/wide_small/public/upload/lol.com_.banner.article.f2protation.27march.jpg?itok=AQ44ensN" width="320" height="180" alt="" title="" />
</div>
</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/rotacao-semanal-gratis-vayne-lulu-braum-e-mais">Rotação Semanal Grátis: Vayne, Lulu, Braum e mais!</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Saudações, Invocadoras e Invocadores! Aqui estão os Campeões grátis desta semana.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-74370">5 hours ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76703">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo" title="Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35804" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/contra-tudo-e-contra-todos-matilha-e-o-youivo">Contra tudo e contra todos - a Matilha e o YoUivo</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">A Red surpreendeu a todos com a escalação do Yoda - mais ainda quando ela se manteve para todos os jogos da série. No entanto, a aposta se pagou. O desempenho do Meio foi essencial para que o uivo trancado no peito ecoasse: a Red está em Recife!</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76703">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>
</div></div></div>
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">

  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte">Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Keyd supera todas as dúvidas plantadas ao longo da Fase Regular, anula o favoritismo Intrépido e carimba as passagens para Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76690">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

1z"/></symbol><symbol id="eixo-icone-usuario"><path d="M12 1.15c-3.6 0-6.5 2.9-6.5 6.5 0 3.61 2.9 6.5 6.5 6.5s6.5-2.89 6.5-6.5c0-3.6-2.9-6.5-6.5-6.5zm0 11.07a4.5 4.5 0 1 1 0-9 4.5 4.5 0 0 1 0             <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-32e60d07-cdd1-4934-82f4-de7465e833be');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/ba/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="Globoesporte.com/ba">

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 19:32:32 --></html>

o;return!n&&(o=y.load(e))?(t&&(o=JSON.parse(o.toString())),o):null},e.prototype.request=function(e,n,t){var o,r,i,a,c,l,u,d,p,g,f,w,m,h,b,v,y;return d=null!=t.expire&&t.expire>=0?t.expire:60,a=t.success||function(){},c=t.error||function(){},i=t.key||n,v=t.type,h=t.skipCache,b=t.timeout||null,p=null,y=t.xhrConfigsCallback,l=t.data,u=null!=t.dataType?t.dataType:v,null==v&&(v=n.split("."),v=v[v.length-1]),g="json"===v,w="json"===u,(o=this.getCache(i,h,g))?void a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return p&&clearTimeout(p),n=f||m.status>=200&&m.status<400,n?(o=m.responseText,g&&(o=JSON.parse(o)),e.complete(o,d,i,h,g,a)):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m)}),"GET"!==e&&l?(w&&(l=JSON.stringify(l)),f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send(l)},0):m.send(l)):f?setTimeout(function(){return m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return i=null!=n.expire&&n.expire>=0?n.expire:60,r=n.success||function(){},o=n.key||e,u=n.skipCache,c=!0,s="ajaxCacheJsonp"+this.jsonpId++,(t=this.getCache(o,u,c))?void r(t):(window[s]=function(e){return function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>

                VC no Fantástico
